title: How a Math Lesson Led to an Animal Speed Clicker Game
excerpt: It started with a simple JavaScript lesson. I introduced my students to the Math object, explaining how Math.random() could generate numbers unpredictably. They nodded, but I could tell—it wasn’t clicking.

title: From Jos to Nationals: How 3 Girls Used Tech to Dream Bigger
